name: Hiromi Sato
description: Hiromi is a member of theTyger Claws, a violent gang based inJapantown. Hiromi is in charge of runningCloudson behalf of the Tygers.He is known to be very uncaring towards the dolls of the club, which proved to be his downfall. Hiromi's associate,Maiko Maeda, betrayed him by outing him to his bosses for ignoring the assault and mistreatment ofEvelyn ParkerbyWoodman. This can end in a bloodbath or one of the bosses will impale Hiromi with his own katana,Tsumetogi.
